parsetree.*:
<root><template><title>RV</title><part><name>type</name>=<value>command
</value></part><part><name index="1"/><value>arma3
</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>1.58
</value></part><part><name>arg</name>=<value> global

</value></part><part><name>gr1</name>=<value> Object Manipulation

</value></part><part><name index="3"/><value> Gets the current value of a trait of the given unit.
<template lineStart="1"><title>Feature </title><part><name index="1"/><value> Informative </value></part><part><name index="2"/><value> For the default values please visit [[setUnitTrait]].</value></part></template>

</value></part><part><name index="4"/><value>unit [[getUnitTrait]] skillName
</value></part><part><name>p1</name>=<value> Unit: [[Object]]
</value></part><part><name>p2</name>=<value> skillName: [[String]] - Name of the skill
</value></part><part><name index="5"/><value>
* [[Boolean]] or [[Number]] - trait's value
* [[Nothing]] - if ''unit'' is invalid, e.g an empty vehicle
</value></part><part><name>x1</name>=<value> <code>[[player]] [[getUnitTrait]] "Medic";</code>
</value></part><part><name>seealso</name>=<value> [[setUnitTrait]], [[getAllUnitTraits]]
</value></part></template></root>
